description: Try our easy to follow Gluten-Free Chicken Caesar Wrap recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken wrap,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Quick & easy lunch,Picnic,Chicken,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Gluten-Free Chicken Caesar Wrap Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup gluten-free Red Kellys caesar salad dressing

recipeInstructions.text: Place a saucepan of salted water over high heat and bring to the boil. Add chicken, reduce heat to low and simmer for 12 minutes or until cooked through. Using tongs, transfer to a plate. Set aside to cool for 10 minutes before shredding.

Meanwhile, bring a small saucepan of water to the boil over medium-high heat. Gently add eggs to boiling water and simmer for 71/2 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer eggs to a bowl of iced water to cool. Peel and slice.

Combine shredded chicken, lettuce, parmesan, parsley and onion in a large bowl. Divide mixture among gluten-free wraps. Season, then top with egg and drizzle with gluten-free dressing. Roll up to enclose filling and serve.
